title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 837.9 - Suspension or modification of penalty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 837.9 - Suspension or modification of penalty

State Regulations

The commission may postpone the imposition of a penalty or
provide for reconsideration of the penalty amount imposed pending correction of
the condition that gave rise to the violation or pending a satisfactory
resolution of any adverse consequences that resulted from the
violation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
837.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
